Name: Rebujito cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon and lime slices.
Review: Dry characterful sherry with sweet zesty lemonade – a combo made for a hot summer’s day.
History: Named after the Spanish word 'arrebujar' meaning to mix, the recipe for a Rebujito changes from region to region in Spain and is often as simple as equal parts fino sherry and soda or equal parts fino sherry and Sprite or Seven-up. It is popular in Seville and the south of Spain, particularly during April’s Seville Fair (La feria de Abril).
Nutrition: One serving of Rebujito cocktail contains 68 calories
